subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: With the firing of Leslie Frazier, the Vikings, who will play the next two seasons outdoors while a new fixed-roof stadium is built, will be looking for their fourth head coach since 2005.
snippet: With the firing of Leslie Frazier, the Vikings, who will play the next two seasons outdoors while a new fixed-roof stadium is built, will be looking for their fourth head coach since 2005.
